roleset.name: cause to be no longer dependent on

roles.note: Can also occur with arg2-off and arg2-of.

example.name: the one example
example.text: But [Time]-1, as part of the more cost-conscious Time Warner, wants [*-1] to wean itself away from expensive gimmicks.

roleset.note: VN updated by Julia, 10/2010. Member of Vncls cheat-10.6.

predicate.note: Frames file for 'wean' based on sentences in wsj.
